name: You encounter a wild Muscle Wizard
description: You tremble as you observe a bald man descending from the skies and standing before you menacingly.

actions.name: Ask him to cast a spell

resultIncident.name: The muscle wizard is getting ready to cast fist.
resultIncident.description: You can feel his power level is quite a bit over nine thousands.

effect.description: You bath in the glory of the fist.
